articles.author: Steve Aschburner
articles.title: Knicks-Pacers: 5 takeaways as Indiana eliminates New York, advances to 2025 Finals - NBA
articles.description: Indiana's magical run continues, led by the right mix of youth, experience, pace and purpose that was enough to oust N.Y.
articles.content:
Indiana forces 18 turnovers in Game 6, converting those miscues into 34 points to advance past New York.
